name: Good Girl
content: 不知怎么的我就坐在这里
因为我已失去了我的爱
I didn't wanna let you in
我起初并不想让你闯进我的心扉
But you did something to me
但当你抚摸着我的手时
你确实让我内心发生了某些反应
Told me you would never do me wrong
说我们共同拥有的都无比强大
So tell me what is this
所以 告诉我 我在陷入的
I thought you took my heart and uh
我认为你带走了我的心
I thought you could be the one
以为你是我需要的一切
I wanna give you the world
No matter how hard I try to fight it
无论我多么努力地斗争
也没有其他男孩能否定这个事实
And it takes all that I got to fight it
爱情耗费了我所有的精力 我必须抵抗它
When I remmeber what you did ooh
当我记得你对我做过的事
For believing in what you said
I put my trust in you
I gave my best to you
In the end there's no more you
I thought you took my heart ooh
我认为你带走了我的心
But I was so mistreated no more you
但我却如此受虐待 再也没有你了
I thought you could be the one
I wanna give you the world
But you let her slip away
I was that girl for you
我就是那个因你而在的女孩
That was always by your side
那个永远站在你这边的女孩
I wanna give you the world
Yes all of my love ooh my love
I wanna give you the world
Yes all of my love ooh my love
Even all the signs above signs above
